Definition:Â  Interlocutory Adoption
An
interlocutory decree of adoption
is a decree of adoption that is not final until some
future point in time, or
future events take place.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B - Biological Children, Adopted Children, and Stepchildren
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section B
